articles.author: Brenley Goertzen
articles.title: Sensational two-way baseball star Shohei Ohtani named the unanimous choice for MVP of the American League - CNN
articles.description: Baseball's sensational two-way star Shohei Ohtani was unanimously voted the 2021 American League Most Valuable Player on Thursday.

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: When Is The Next ‘Blood Moon’ Lunar Eclipse? Countdown Begins To North America’s Twin Totalities In 2022 - Forbes
articles.description: Just seen the odd-looking partial lunar eclipse? Good news! There will be two total lunar eclipses visible from North America next year. Here's everything you need to know about them.
articles.content: A full moon is seen framed with a US flag during totality of a total lunar eclipse as the moon ... [+] enters Earth's shadow for a "Super Blood Moon" on May 26, 2021 in Chico, California. - Stargazer… [+3547 chars]

articles.title: Traveller from Nigeria hits America with monkeypox, CDC on alert - P.M. News
articles.description: A Maryland resident in the United States, who just travelled from Nigeria, tests positive for the rare virus monkeypox.
articles.content:
